messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Would you be willing to complete a short survey?
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone: I m doing a survey and would appreciate unschooling parents input about their children s media habits and parent s response. This is a 7
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone:
I'm doing a survey and would appreciate unschooling parents' input about their children's media habits and parent's response.
This is a 7 question survey that I would be most happy if you could respond to. The survey is at the bottom of the home page of www.professionalparenting.ca
Thank you!

Judy Arnall, Peaceful Parenting Expert, Speaker and Author of "Discipline Without Distress: 135 tools for raising caring, responsible children without time-out, spanking, punishment or bribery" www.professionalparenting.ca Tele: (403) 714-6766 Email jarnall@... "Peace In The World Begins In The Home"



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
